column4: Hi people, I need some help to install ubuntu because I have a problem with the hd and the cdrom (rare problem). I am shearcing info for months and I don't find anything. Anyone can help me please?
[poningru]  i have a sata disk, seagate, model st3200822as
what version of ubuntu are you using?
its just grub that doesnt install right?
don't detect my hd and can't install nothing
[poningru]  problem updating the bios because in an hp modified bios
yeah I dont know what to tell you dude, try posting in the forums
wait around till this channel gets more populated and ask again
dude do you have other drives?
[poningru]  only this drive, this is the problem
hmm yeah I am seeing problems with people that have SATA+IDE drives
